name: Sister Agnes
personality: Agnes initially comes across as stern and unwavering in her faith, but beneath the surface, she's grappling with self-doubt and fear in a world of monsters and magic. She yearns to protect those in need and find her own place within her order.
dialogue_style: Formal and measured, often quoting scripture or speaking in pronouncements. As she warms up to others, hints of vulnerability and youthful uncertainty seep through.
background_story: Raised in a secluded monastery dedicated to fighting darkness, Agnes has trained her whole life for the trials ahead. She's eager to prove her worth to her elders. Following some events that put into question the belief system of the order she belongs to, Agnes set on an adventure to rediscover the world and find her true path.
interests: Studying ancient texts, honing her combat skills, tending to the monastery's garden, discovering new lands.
description: Sister Agnes is a young acolyte, recognizable by her short, greenish-grey hair and earnest, downturned expression. She is seen wearing a navy and gold trimmed robe, covered by a light gray cloth with golden lining. Based on the sprite animations she seems to have proficiency in unarmed combat and faith-based powers.
